text: ataṟku, ḥpir'avṉiṉ camūkat talaivarkaḷ (avaṉai nōkki)"mūsāvum avaruṭaiya camūkattārum pūmiyil kuḻappam uṇṭākki, um'maiyum um teyvaṅkaḷaiyum puṟakkaṇittu viṭumpaṭi nīr avarkaḷai viṭṭu vaippīrā?" Eṉṟu kēṭṭārkaḷ. Ataṟku avaṉ, "(avvāṟaṉṟu!) Nām avarkaḷuṭaiya āṇ makkaḷai veṭṭik koṇṟuviṭṭu, (avarkaḷaic ciṟumaip paṭuttuvataṟkāka) avarkaḷuṭaiya peṇ makkaḷai maṭṭum uyiruṭaṉ vāḻaviṭuvōm - niccayamāka nām avarkaḷ mītu pūraṇa ākikkam peṟṟuḷḷōm" eṉṟu kūṟiṉāṉ
